name: IMPRES Technology Solutions
tagline: Services where when and the way our customers want
description:
For over a decade, IMPRES has provided the DoD, federal, state, and local agencies with a comprehensive fulfillment arm. Our certified Pre-Sales Engineering Team has instant access to technical specifications from over 725 manufacturers. They are able to quickly construct the ideal tailored solution based on program criteria such as: Form, Fit, Function, Budget, and Product/Program Lifecycle. What separates IMPRES from other Value Added Resellers (VAR) is our consultative approach.
With a vendor neutral methodology, IMPRES keeps its allegiance where it belongs, with its customers and their requirements.
Although IMPRESâ€™ product catalogue spans thousands of products, we specialize in commercial-grade and rugged: desktops, servers, storage, data center virtualization, mobile-devices, networking, secure video-teleconferencing equipment, and cyber security appliances.
